p: On his next primary care follow-up visit, in mid-May 2018, he had been off morphine for 6 days and controlling his symptoms using the recommended combo of high-dose CBD oil daily (t.d.) and THC butter 2 to 3 times daily (t.i.d.). He described the pain as no longer crippling and saw an increase in his daily functioning and overall activity, that is, he was able to walk more and perform more strenuous activity.
